reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and is perfect for elegant events and weddings, with one noting it's tailored for specific body types.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally found the perfect dress!
items.body: This dress definitely exceeded my expectations. It is comfortable and stylish. I love how I look in it and confident I won’t be constantly fidgeting with it in any way. The fabric is fairly heavy (in a good way) probably better for fall or winter, and the rouging hides my tummy nicely. Highly recommend!! I’m 5’8”, 155lbs and got a medium. Fits like a glove. Read more
items.author: Carrie Taber

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Length
items.body: Couldn’t love this dress anymore! It is more of a thicker material. Dress offers ruching in the tummy area for those of us that could use a bit of “enhancing”. The ruffles stand & lay nicely. Not flimsy. It is a mermaid fit. I’m in between a medium/large. I did order this dress in both a large & an XL based on reviews. I opted for a not so slim fitting look and went with the XL. I can pull the dress off and in without having to unzip it being that I sized up. For the taller/longer leg girlies, I am 5’5.5” (longer torso and shorter legs) & the dress hits approx 1” above my foot. Def not floor length. Super cute with kitten heels. Ruled out regular heels due to where the dress hits on me. Would def buy again in other colors. Read more
items.author: Thomas Patrick

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice
items.body: I like the material its heavy enough u can't see through it and it fits very nice i should have gotten L but I thought ot maybe run small n I needed it in Hurry so I got the extra, a bit big but I am going to make it work. I would reorder in large Read more
items.author: Ramona Lumpkin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress!!
items.body: I wore this dress to my nieces wedding last week. I spent months and months trying to find the perfect dress or pants set. Everyone I looked at, I would look at actual photos in review of people that ordered them. This was the ONLY dress that had women of all sizes showing their photo review in comments and looked classy and flattering on EVERY single woman!! As soon as it came in, I tried it on and it was perfect! I didn’t have to have it altered at all.Almost like it was tailored for your specific body type. The fabric was a thicker material, but never once did I get hot in it. I would 10,000 percent recommend this dress for anyone all shapes and sizes. The thinkness of the material hides and imperfections you might have.Oh and it was super super cozy!! I’m a 5,7 145 pounds and bought a large. This the the only pic of the dress I have right now. I’m the one on the left and of course I’m setting down, but you can get a small glimps of it. Read more
items.author: Kari Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Love this dress but I was just too short in height
items.body: So beautiful and I love the color the fabric was soft and fit perfectly it’s a beautiful dress but it’s long on my 5”3’ height so wear higher heals than normal or it will brag Read more
items.author: Bakersfield, Ca

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs big in my opinion
items.body: Wish I would have sized down. Material is very heavy and not as formfitting as I would’ve liked. We’ll have to have the dress altered. Read more
items.author: Boy mom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy in RED
items.body: Omg! Fit and feel was everything. Fabric is thick and very red. Read more
items.author: Trizzy_Triz

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best purchases I've ever made
items.body: This dress was everything I hoped it would be and more. It was one of the best purchases I've ever made. I ordered an XL. I'm 5'4" and weigh 230 lbs. It was true to size and fit like a glove with a little extra room. The material was soft and stretchy. It looked amazing on me. I wore it to my daughter's wedding and received so many compliments. I'm so glad I found this dress! Read more
items.author: cassandra demps

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Evening Mermaid Ruched Cocktail Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Evening Mermaid Ruched Cocktail Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, White, Purple, Burgundy, Royalblue, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
